line: oh just so exhausted from dragging around this

heres to phoebe who is found the greatest guy in the world
oh and i have something for you

it is got the numbers of all the guys dated
oh pheebs baby that is nice but you know what i think ok
why do not you give it to one of your other single girlfriends
i would but you are the last one

oh it is ok no he was old yeah
and he lived a full life he was in the first wave at omaha beach
hey sorry i should have given you guys my black book when i got married
although it was not so much a book as a
with janices phone number on it
phoebe is not jethro tull a band
my agency was bidding for a big account and they got it
it is my first national commercial
yeah and i do not wanna brag but a lot of the ideas were mine
hey can you cast me in it
i do not know i really do not think you are right for the part
i can do anything a chameleon
uh but i really do not think you are right for this
the part calls for a stuffy college professor
when not busy thinking of important things or
software that facilitates inter business networking e solutions
guess who is a finalist for a huge research grant
give you a hint he is looking right at you
ah well unless it is the creepy guy with his hand up his kilt gonna say congratulations
oh so excited i mean apparently i beat out hundreds of other applicants included five guys i went to graduate school with
not that keeping score or anything
so tell me about the grant
well ok it is for 25 thousand dollars
and if i get it finally be able to complete my field research
and there will be an article about me in the paleontology review
thatll be the first time my name is in there without people raising serious questions about my work
are you talking about the dewar grant
benjamin hobart is administering that grant
so your ex boyfriend is gonna determine if your new boyfriend gets this grant
wow your new boyfriend is screwed
no no we ended up in great terms
i mean if anything i think this could help you
why do not we all go out to dinner together and i can introduce you
well if you think it would help
ok now is there anything i can do to
he does have a pretty serious latex fetish
we will see how dinner goes
hey you wanna go to see a movie
well i told you i had to spend all the day clearing out stuff so mike could move in
now that here i might as well help you with the cleaning and organizing
just happen to have my label maker
oh it is so hard to get rid of stuff
did you and chandler have to make compromises when you first moved in together
what does he want you to give up
he wants me to get rid of gladys
i really hate to give her up
why you do not like her
but you know i think that you are giving up too easy honey
i think that you need to fight for her
yes you say to him sorry mike i cannot live without her she means too much to me
oh wait oh i just realized
if i do that that means you do not get her
damn it i did not think this through
joe i told you you are just not right for the part
rach do not i seem like a professor you had buy some kind of e crap from
sorry this sounds like something never gonna be interested in
it is not like asking for some crazy favour
this is what i do for a living
oh man two hours late for work
look heres a copy of my reels
it is got all the commercials that been in
just watch it and if you do not like it you do not pass it on to your bosses
what am i gonna do now
just pass it to your boss
he is not right for the part
so if i suggest him my bosses are gonna think an idiot
and that is something they should learn on their own
just tell joey that you watched the tape and you liked it but your bosses did not
then that way you are the good guy and they are the bad guys
i liked it they did not
joey for gods sake go to work
i cannot believe about to meet benjamin hobart
always thought of him as one of the people invite to my fantasy dinner party
do you think there is any chance he will bring christie brinkley or c3po
sorry looks like it is just him
my god you look absolutely stunning
i am having a good hair day
it is an honor to meet you
i cannot tell you how long been an admirer of your work i mean that nobel prize whoooo
i mean i have to tell you that you are one of the reasons i got into the field
never heard of you until this morning but it is nice to be nice
i cannot believe that you chose this restaurant
oh my god i completely forgot
i cannot believe they let us back in this place
no but it is you know it is just a funny image you know the two of you in this restaurant with
ross why do not you tell benji about your proposal while i go to the ladies room
ok well i would like to do a dig in the painted desert
see there are still several areas that have not been fully excavated
did you just say break up with charlie
yes i did say it and no i did not not say it
kind of inappropriate do not you think
i just have not seen her for so long
all these feelings are rushing back
starting to realize how much i missed her and gonna need you to break up with her
if you say yes then serious if you say no then joking
hey how did it go with mike is he gonna let you keep the painting
but he is gonna let me keep my box of human hair
so you got to pick your battles
but the good news is gladys is yours
wow what is the bad news
oh she is that work of art i made you know with the woman coming out of the frame
oh and monica gets to keep her
oh i did not know you wanted her too
well i mean sure of course
you already gave that to monica so
you know i would give her up for you
no i could not let you do that
but i do not want you to
heads she is rachels tails she is monicas
no that landed in your food
i watched the tape and passed it along to my bosses and they were not interested
my bosses did not go for it
you did not watch the tape
look it is one thing not to cast me but to lie to me
not lying to you i watched it
telling you i watched the tape
the selection committee has chosen the three of you as our finalists today
the ultimate decision will be based upon the answers you give to the questions i ask here
li you claim the field is too reliant on the linnaean taxonomic system
how do you propose to correct this problem
well i believe that the answers lie in the osteological evidence
biely your proposal includes some field work
primarily in the pierre shale region of south dakota
that is not even kinda close
li how many graduate students you had be needing
three for excavation and two for analysis
geller which 1965 shirelles hit was later covered by a popular british invasion band
sorry we were looking for baby it is you
wait wait wait just a minute
none of my questions have anything to do with paleontology
yeah i just made it up
no it starts with a silent m
i hate being called a liar
yes and i have to say i am not just hurt
when i tell somebody i did something
let me just stop you right there ok
then you lied about lying ok
then you lied about lying about lying ok
so before you lie about lying about lying about lying about
why are you so sure i did not watch this tape
heres how i know you did not watch the tape ok
if you had seen what was on this tape believe me you would have some comments
alright now remember i got paid a lot of money for this and it only aired in japan
and that is how i know you did not watch the tape
well gladys say hello to your new home
oh she is so nice and big
oh monica where are you going to display gladys oh so proudly
i have not really settled on a spot yet
how about right above the tv
that way it will be the first thing that you see when you walk in the door
and you can get rid of that french poster
it does not have anything coming out of it
or maybe there is some place for her in your bedroom
there is nothing above your bed
uh have you come to ask me some more paleontology related questions
i think i may have let my feelings for charlie interfere with the interview process
anyway decided to offer you the grant
i have to break up with charlie
she sold it to me for a very reasonable price
joey we are not keeping this
but it is an original buffay
as long as you do not mind that she is haunted
well legend has it joey that
she comes alive when you are asleep
she climbs out of the frame and then drags her half a body across the floor just looking for legs to steal
and then with her one good hand she slo o owly re e a aches up and turns your doorknob
get that legless witch out of here
well why i told him it is haunted
two can play at this game
she is m i i ne
you do not have to fight over her anymore
whoever does not get gladys gets glynnis
look sorry i did not give them your tape
and i promise next time to submit you whether i think you are right for the part or not
that is not the point chandler
the point is that you lied
what is it gonna take for you to forgive me
no i did not and you want to know why
because your ex boyfriend is still in love with you
he would not give me the grant because i would not give you up
benji is not in love with me
i mean he broke up with me
and besides he is a very ethical man
is it ethical to ask someone in a grant review who was the voice of underdog
sure he was just joking ross
if you do not believe me let us go talk to him okay
telling you he did not ask me one paleontological question
well if it is like the lake mbosco in congo then m b o
i want you to tell her everything
about the deal you tried to make with me about the crazy questions you
that is the voice of underdog
like i tried to tell you in the interview ross this grant is not based on your knowledge of pretty useless trivia
i want you to look her in the eyes and tell her the truth
but it is only because i still love you
and i would do anything to have you back in my life
i never should have broken up with you
i think about you all the time
i mean do you ever still think about me
i do not know what to say benji
listen i know i may be way out of bounds here but is there any chance you will take me back
sweetie this conversation is starting to make me a little uncomfortable
there is so much history between us you know
ha ha ha third time this week
man this does not get old
oh do not be such a baby
